dt: {bc}the art or process of producing images by the action of radiant energy and especially light on a sensitive surface (such as film or an optical sensor)

shortdef: the art or process of producing images by the action of radiant energy and especially light on a sensitive surface (such as film or an optical sensor)

dt: {bc}a process in which an image is obtained by application of a high-frequency electric field to an object so that it radiates a characteristic pattern of luminescence that is recorded on photographic film

dt: {bc}the person who is in charge of filming for a movie

dt: {bc}photography that uses special methods to make things that are not real seem to be real
